execution_summary: Environment built with Python 3.10-slim, installed pandas, numpy, statsmodels, pyreadr. Adjusted dataset path in replicate_hossain_democracy.py to locate RDS file within container. Executed OLS regression with HC3 robust SE on 150-country sample. Democracy index coefficient is 78.96 (SE 19.82, p≈0.000), positive and significant, replicating original claim though magnitude slightly lower than original 86.76.

code_executed.logs: Model converged; R^2=0.36; democracy coef=78.959 (p<0.001). Results saved to /app/data/hossain_replication_results.csv

results.hypothesis_tested: A one-point increase in the 0-10 Democracy Index is associated with more confirmed COVID-19 cases per million population (as of 3 Apr 2020), controlling for temperature and trade openness.

tables.table_description: OLS regression output reproducing original Table 2 column with preferred controls.
